articles.author: Rohan Nadkarni
articles.title: Indiana had the most losses in college football history. Now it's a championship contender. - NBC News
articles.description: Behind a star quarterback and popular head coach, the Indiana Hoosiers are No. 2 in the country and face No. 1 Ohio State for the Big Ten title on Saturday night.
articles.content:
At the start of the college football season, no Division I program had more losses in its history than Indianas 715 defeats.
But 15 weeks later, as we enter conference championship Saturday, that nu… [+6697 chars]
